vulnerability_findings.name: non-payable-constructor

vulnerability_findings.message: Consider making costructor payable to save gas.

vulnerability_findings.name: use-multiple-require
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: require(accrualBlockNumber == 0 && borrowIndex == 0, "market may only be initialized once");
vulnerability_findings.message: Using multiple require statements is cheaper than using && multiple check combinations. There are more advantages, such as easier to read code and better coverage reports.

vulnerability_findings.name: use-short-revert-string
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: require(msg.sender == admin, "only admin may initialize the market");
vulnerability_findings.message: Shortening revert strings to fit in 32 bytes will decrease gas costs for deployment and  gas costs when the revert condition has been met.

vulnerability_findings.name: compound-borrowfresh-reentrancy
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: doTransferOut(borrower, borrowAmount);
vulnerability_findings.message: Function borrowFresh() in Compound performs state update after doTransferOut()

vulnerability_findings.name: erc20-interface
vulnerability_findings.message:
EIP20NonStandardInterface (VDaiDelegate.sol#1263-1324) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (VDaiDelegate.sol#1289)
	-transferFrom (VDaiDelegate.sol#1303)

vulnerability_findings.name: erc20-interface
vulnerability_findings.message:
GemLike (VDaiDelegate.sol#3215-3221) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-approve (VDaiDelegate.sol#3216-3217)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in VToken._addReservesInternal (VDaiDelegate.sol#2571-2583):
	External calls:
	- error = accrueInterest() (VDaiDelegate.sol#2572-2573)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalReserves (VDaiDelegate.sol#2579-2580)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in VToken._reduceReserves (VDaiDelegate.sol#2634-2644):
	External calls:
	- error = accrueInterest() (VDaiDelegate.sol#2635-2636)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalReserves (VDaiDelegate.sol#2641-2642)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in VToken._setComptroller (VDaiDelegate.sol#2503-2522):
	External calls:
	- require(bool,string)(newComptroller.isComptroller(),marker method returned false) (VDaiDelegate.sol#2511-2512)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- comptroller (VDaiDelegate.sol#2514-2515)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in VToken._setInterestRateModel (VDaiDelegate.sol#2699-2709):
	External calls:
	- error = accrueInterest() (VDaiDelegate.sol#2700-2701)
	- _setInterestRateModelFresh(newInterestRateModel) (VDaiDelegate.sol#2706-2707)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- interestRateModel (VDaiDelegate.sol#2706-2707)

Reentrancy in VToken._setInterestRateModelFresh (VDaiDelegate.sol#2715-2745):

vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in VToken._setReserveFactor (VDaiDelegate.sol#2527-2537):

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in VToken.accrueInterest (VDaiDelegate.sol#1709-1787):
	External calls:
	- borrowRateMantissa = interestRateModel.getBorrowRate(cashPrior,borrowsPrior,reservesPrior) (VDaiDelegate.sol#1726)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- accrualBlockNumber (VDaiDelegate.sol#1778)
	- borrowIndex (VDaiDelegate.sol#1779)
	- totalBorrows (VDaiDelegate.sol#1780)
	- totalReserves (VDaiDelegate.sol#1781)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in VToken.borrowInternal (VDaiDelegate.sol#2065-2073):
	External calls:
	- error = accrueInterest() (VDaiDelegate.sol#2066)
	- borrowFresh(msg.sender,borrowAmount) (VDaiDelegate.sol#2072)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalBorrows (VDaiDelegate.sol#2072)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in VToken.initialize (VDaiDelegate.sol#1351-1382):
	External calls:
	- err = _setComptroller(comptroller_) (VDaiDelegate.sol#1365)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- accrualBlockNumber (VDaiDelegate.sol#1369)
	- borrowIndex (VDaiDelegate.sol#1370)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in VToken.liquidateBorrowInternal (VDaiDelegate.sol#2277-2292):
	External calls:
	- error = accrueInterest() (VDaiDelegate.sol#2278)
	- error = vTokenCollateral.accrueInterest() (VDaiDelegate.sol#2284)
	- liquidateBorrowFresh(msg.sender,borrower,repayAmount,vTokenCollateral) (VDaiDelegate.sol#2291)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalBorrows (VDaiDelegate.sol#2291)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in VToken.redeemFresh (VDaiDelegate.sol#1938-2058):
	External calls:
	- allowed = comptroller.redeemAllowed(address(this),redeemer,vars.redeemTokens) (VDaiDelegate.sol#1978)
	- IComptroller(address(comptroller)).treasuryPercent() != 0 (VDaiDelegate.sol#2021-2042)
	- (vars.mathErr,feeAmount) = mulUInt(vars.redeemAmount,IComptroller(address(comptroller)).treasuryPercent()) (VDaiDelegate.sol#2022)
	- doTransferOut(address(uint160(IComptroller(address(comptroller)).treasuryAddress())),feeAmount) (VDaiDelegate.sol#2037)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- accountTokens (VDaiDelegate.sol#2048)
	- totalSupply (VDaiDelegate.sol#2047)

Reentrancy in VToken.repayBorrowBehalfInternal (VDaiDelegate.sol#2173-2181):
	External calls:
	- error = accrueInterest() (VDaiDelegate.sol#2174)
	- repayBorrowFresh(msg.sender,borrower,repayAmount) (VDaiDelegate.sol#2180)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalBorrows (VDaiDelegate.sol#2180)

Reentrancy in VToken.repayBorrowInternal (VDaiDelegate.sol#2157-2165):

	- error = accrueInterest() (VDaiDelegate.sol#2158)
	- repayBorrowFresh(msg.sender,msg.sender,repayAmount) (VDaiDelegate.sol#2164)
	State variables written after the call(s):

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-benign

	External calls:
	- dai = daiJoin.dai() (VDaiDelegate.sol#3069-3070)
	- vat = daiJoin.vat() (VDaiDelegate.sol#3070-3071)

	- daiJoinAddress (VDaiDelegate.sol#3074-3075)
	- potAddress (VDaiDelegate.sol#3075-3076)
	- vatAddress (VDaiDelegate.sol#3076-3078)
